thread.title: Multi-national corporates call for UN talks to facilitate carbon markets
thread.title_full: Multi-national corporates call for UN talks to facilitate carbon markets

title: Multi-national corporates call for UN talks to facilitate carbon markets
text:
End date Multi-national corporates call for UN talks to facilitate carbon markets 
A group of 14 leading industrial companies have called on negotiators at the UN climate change talks in Paris in December to deliver an agreement that facilitates international carbon markets. To access this article please sign-in below or register for a free one-month trial. Login
